definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[כדר]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. kadara VII. shoot or rush down (of hawk, star, etc.; also of an attacking force) so Thes Fl in De:Job 15:24 Buhl Di al.; v. also mod. Ar. kd=r annoy, vex, reprimand, Spiro:Vocab.; kdr oftener be dark, gloomy, turbid, whence > [[כידור]] = seething tumult, of battle, cf. Kö:ii, 147, § 71, 1).
